content: What legendary British musician, known for his flamboyant style and hits like "Rocket Man" and "Tiny Dancer," was born Reginald Kenneth Dwight?

That would be Elton John, born Reginald Kenneth Dwight. He's a legendary British musician known for his incredible talent, flamboyant style, and countless hits that have stood the test of time. His music has touched the lives of millions and continues to be enjoyed by people all around the world.
